title: `contrastive-image-text/run_clip.py` example problems
raw_output:
{'files_to_modify': ['examples/pytorch/contrastive-image-text/run_clip.py', 'examples/pytorch/contrastive-image-text/image_caption_dataset.py', 'transformers/Trainer.py', 'transformers/TrainingArguments.py', 'transformers/utils/trainer_utils.py'], 'reasoning': "1. The main script run_clip.py must be modified to sanitize captions like 'None', 'null', 'NA', integrate hub repository targeting, and optionally add experiment tracking such as wandb.
2. image_caption_dataset.py (if present, as referenced in dataset_name_mapping) may need updates to data loading/cleaning logic. If this script does not exist, data handoff occurs solely in run_clip.py.
3. Trainer.py in transformers manages training workflow, including push_to_hub calls; modifications may be needed for custom hub repo integration or improvement.
4. TrainingArguments.py controls setup and configuration for the Trainer; changes here may allow finer-grained hub and logging options.
5. utils/trainer_utils.py in transformers may facilitate telemetry and experiment tracking, including integrating wandb or custom hub logic."}
